description: This file defines the Backbone.js view 'AppView' for a Todo application, managing UI rendering, event handling, and interactions with the Todo collection.

classes.name: app.AppView
classes.description: Top-level Backbone view managing the Todo app UI, including rendering, event handling, and collection interactions.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Updates the UI to reflect the current state of the Todo collection, including statistics and filter selection.

methods.name: addOne
methods.description: Creates a new TodoView for a given todo model and appends it to the list.

methods.name: addAll
methods.description: Clears the current list and adds all todos from the collection.

methods.name: filterOne
methods.description: Triggers visibility update for a single todo item.

methods.name: newAttributes
methods.description: Generates attributes for a new Todo item based on input field.

methods.name: createOnEnter
methods.description: Creates a new Todo model when Enter key is pressed and input is not empty.

methods.name: clearCompleted
methods.description: Removes all completed todos from the collection.

methods.name: toggleAllComplete
methods.description: Sets all todos' completed status based on the toggle checkbox.
